about_the_game:
Welcome to Rogue Monster Rush!

Embark on an ever-changing journey to defend your island base from hordes of invading robots in this challenging roguelike tower defense game.

Key Features:

  • Monstrous Tower Defense: Collect and command a variety of monster defenders, each with unique abilities, to fend off waves of relentless enemies. Hatch and assemble your ultimate party and unleash havoc upon the invading forces.

  • Dynamic Roguelike Gameplay: Every playthrough is a new adventure! Build your maps with randomly chosen tiles, discover powerful upgrades, and adapt your tactics to overcome increasingly challenging waves of foes.

  • Strategic Depth: Master the art of monster placement, resource management, team composition, leader abilities, and upgrades to outsmart and overpower your adversaries.

  • Active Gameplay: Engage in a dynamic and active playstyle where every moment counts. Unleash player abilities for clutch moments and enjoy more interactive and thrilling gameplay experiences than traditional tower defense.

  • Incredible Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game's energy with an incredible soundtrack that sets the tone for epic battles and intense moments. Soundtrack by Zach Degaetano & Jordan Witzigreuter

Are you ready to defend the island and unleash the power of the monsters? Join the fight in Rogue Monster Rush today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD at 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb VRAM Nvidia or Radeon
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Experience a unique blend of roguelike and tower defense in Rogue Monster Rush! Collect and command an array of monster defenders, unleash strategic player abilities, unlock tons of upgrades, to defend your town from the invading robots.
